data.text: @Ryan_r_Williams Just found out a friend who works for Federal gov lost their job today bc of @liberal_party @JustinTrudeau #VaccineMandate How can working from home impose a risk on coworkers? It has been proven both vaxx & unvaxxed are spreaders. This is about government control & nothing more
@Ryan_r_Williams Why Unvaccinated Canadian can’t travel outside of Canada?
@Ryan_r_Williams Why Unvaccinated Canadian can’t travel outside of Canada and why people from another country is unvaccinated can come to Canada?
@Karmun6765 @Ryan_r_Williams You can get an exemption. Check the site.

@MichaelGPurdy @Ryan_r_Williams People were fighting for bodily autonomy. Yes, people want freedom of choice. Enough with this bs. You think Canada is that important that anyone would fund a "government overthrow".  🙄
@tanneralford1 @Ryan_r_Williams So still the only country in the world imprisoning unvaxxed citizens? What a "free" country
